attributes.action: force cyclists to take out public liability insurance when riding on public highways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you've ever been left out of pocket by cyclists damaging your car or property or had to take evasive action that caused a crash because of dangerous bike riding on the road, then back my petition please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
